resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    size=0,
    runtime_mappings={
        "price.adjusted": {
            "type": "double",
            "script": {
                "source": "emit(doc['price'].value * params.adjustment)",
                "params": {
                    "adjustment": 0.9
                }
            }
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "by_date": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "date",
                "calendar_interval": "month"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "avg_price": {
                    "rate": {
                        "field": "price.adjusted"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
